title: So is the game down?
body: Just wondering.  Well, I dont mean down down, I mean borked up.  I can only do aram and Blind pick, both which kinda suck.

replies.body: I don't see any issues with any games modes currently.  Are you getting any specific errors?
Yea, I have the same issue, I can only select Blind Pick and Aram, the rest are shaded and an empty "message" appears when I try to select it
